# enum HepaFilterMonitoringTrait.ChangeIndicationEnum
The condition of the HEPA filter.
### Enum Values
- `Critical`: The HEPA filter needs replacement.
- `OK`: The HEPA filter is in good condition.
- `UnknownValue`: The enum value is out of range.
- `Warning`: The HEPA filter will need replacing soon.

# interface PumpConfigurationAndControl
API for the PumpConfigurationAndControl trait. This trait provides an interface for the setup and control of pump devices, and the automatic reporting of pump status information.
### Nested types
- `enum Attribute`: Descriptor enum for this trait's attributes.
### Public functions
- `fun supports(attribute: PumpConfigurationAndControl.Attribute): Boolean`
### Inherited functions
- `suspend fun forceRead()`
- `suspend fun update(...)`: Creates a mutable copy of an object, mutates it, saves it, and returns a new immutable copy.
### Public properties
- `open val factory: TraitFactory<PumpConfigurationAndControl>`
### Inherited properties
- `acceptedCommandList: List<UInt>`: List of supported client-generated commands.
- `attributeList: List<UInt>`: List of supported attribute IDs.
- `capacity: Short?`: Actual capacity of the pump as a percentage of the effective maximum setpoint.
- `clusterRevision: UShort`: Revision of the server cluster specification.
- `controlMode: PumpConfigurationAndControlTrait.ControlModeEnum?`: The control mode of the pump.
- `effectiveControlMode: PumpConfigurationAndControlTrait.ControlModeEnum?`: The current effective control mode of the pump.
- `effectiveOperationMode: PumpConfigurationAndControlTrait.OperationModeEnum?`: The current effective operation mode of the pump.
- `featureMap: PumpConfigurationAndControlTrait.Feature`: Supported optional cluster features.
- `generatedCommandList: List<UInt>`: List of supported server-generated commands.
- `lifetimeEnergyConsumed: UInt?`: Accumulated energy consumption in kWh.
- `lifetimeRunningHours: UInt?`: Accumulated running hours of the pump motor.
- `maxCompPressure: Short?`: Maximum compensated pressure.
- `maxConstFlow: UShort?`: Maximum constant flow.
- `maxConstPressure: Short?`: Maximum constant pressure.
- `maxConstSpeed: UShort?`: Maximum constant speed.
- `maxConstTemp: Short?`: Maximum constant temperature.
- `maxFlow: UShort?`: Maximum achievable flow.
- `maxPressure: Short?`: Maximum achievable pressure.
- `maxSpeed: UShort?`: Maximum achievable speed.
- `minCompPressure: Short?`: Minimum compensated pressure.
- `minConstFlow: UShort?`: Minimum constant flow.
- `minConstPressure: Short?`: Minimum constant pressure.
- `minConstSpeed: UShort?`: Minimum constant speed.
- `minConstTemp: Short?`: Minimum constant temperature.
- `operationMode: PumpConfigurationAndControlTrait.OperationModeEnum?`: The operation mode of the pump.
- `power: UInt?`: Actual power consumption in watts.
- `pumpStatus: PumpConfigurationAndControlTrait.PumpStatusBitmap?`: Activity status of the pump functions.
- `speed: UShort?`: Actual speed of the pump in RPM.
- `metadata: Trait.TraitMetadata`

--- package: com.google.home.matter.standard.ColorControlTrait.HueDirection ---
--- source: https://developers.home.google.com/reference/kotlin/com/google/home/matter/standard/ColorControlTrait.HueDirection ---
# enum ColorControlTrait.HueDirection
The direction in which to move a device's hue along the hue circle.
### Enum Values
- `Down`: Decreases the hue value.
- `LongestDistance`: Moves along the longest path to reach the target hue.
- `ShortestDistance`: Moves along the shortest path to reach the target hue.
- `UnknownValue`: The enum value is out of range.
- `Up`: Increases the hue value.
### Public functions
- `valueOf(value: String): ColorControlTrait.HueDirection`: Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
- `values(): Array<ColorControlTrait.HueDirection>`: Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type.
### Public properties
- `open val traitId: String`
- `open val typeName: String`
- `open val value: ULong`
